casebody.data:
UNITED STATES of America, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. Luther Hugh HULETT, Defendant-Appellant. No. 71-1264

Summary Calendar.*

United States Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. Sept. 13, 1971. *490William C. Calhoun, Augusta, Ga., for defendant-appellant. Wm. J. Scholoth, U. S. Atty., Ronald T. Knight, Macon, Ga., for plaintiff-appellee.

Before GEWIN, GOLDBERG and DYER, Circuit Judges.

Rule 18, 5 Cir.; see Isbell Enterprises, Inc. v. Citizens Casualty Co. of New York et al., 5th Cir. 1970, 431 F.2d 409, Part I.

 PER CURIAM:

Judgment affirmed. See Local Rule 21.1

. See NLRB v. Amalgamated Clothing Workers of America, 430 F.2d 966 (5th Cir. 1970).
